raw_lines: RVMLogging.out.println(Level.CRITICAL, "The timeout value for InetAddress.isReachable() should not be a negative value.");

events.name: isreachable
events.pointcut_raw: call(* InetAddress+.isReachable(NetworkInterface, int, int)) && args(*, ttl, timeout)

raw_lines: RVMLogging.out.println(Level.CRITICAL, "The ttl value and the timeout value for InetAddress.isReachable() should not be negative values.");
RVMLogging.out.println(Level.CRITICAL, "The ttl value for InetAddress.isReachable() should not be a negative value.");
RVMLogging.out.println(Level.CRITICAL, "The timeout value for InetAddress.isReachable() should not be a negative value.");
